overview: From 2025-08-19 to 2025-08-20, ethereum-optimism/optimism had 2 new PRs (0 merged), 4 new issues, and 9 active contributors.

topIssues.title: op-acceptance-tests: Missing test logs
topIssues.author: janjakubnanista
topIssues.body:
**Description**

[This CI run](https://app.circleci.com/pipelines/github/ethereum-optimism/optimism/98223/workflows/f4c25eef-d1df-45f8-bb36-c273ce969ca9/jobs/3777991/steps) reports multiple failed tests yet logs are:

- Missing for any `TestL2EngineAPI*` tests
- Empty for e.g. `TestL1MinerBuildBlock`

**Acceptance criteria**

Ensure the failed tests correctly report their logs

topIssues.title: op-up: add some cute ascii on startup
topIssues.author: tessr
topIssues.body:
Discussed in Slack, but let's add a little friendly ascii message to op-up when it starts up (and before it starts showing logs). 

Something like:

```
###################################
             Welcome to
   ___  _ __        _   _ _ __  
  / _ \| '_ \ _____| | | | '_ \ 
 | (_) | |_) |_____| |_| | |_) |
  \___/| .__/       \__,_| .__/ 
       |_|               |_|   

    Your local OP Stack chain

###################################
```

topIssues.title: op-up: add link to survey on shutdown
topIssues.author: tessr
topIssues.body:
When a user ends the op-up process, we should prompt them with a link to fill out our builder survey:

```
New L2 block: number 31565, hash 0xd58b7aa8be49a9c1e65234a251c259a6caccd660ec91e89cf23a80b996657b20
New L2 block: number 31566, hash 0x99f3b314cfe5d3021ae7d5be2b851220ba91bda4291bb0c832f4fe46bf67dbc4
^C
Exiting, code: 0

#########################################################
#                                                       #
#  Thinking about building on the OP Stack?             #
#  We'd love to hear from you!                          #
#  Take our dev survey: https://optimism.io/dev-survey  #
#                                                       #
#########################################################

```

Ideally the URL is clickable.

topIssues.title: public docs review of Flashblocks
topIssues.author: yashvardhan-kukreja
topIssues.body: Coordinate and review Blessing's drafts of public docs he is prepping of flashblocks

topPRs.title: chore: Investigate missing logs in acceptance tests
topPRs.author: janjakubnanista
topPRs.body:
<!--
Contributions welcome! See https://github.com/ethereum-optimism/.github/blob/master/CONTRIBUTING.md
-->

**Description**

[This CI run](https://app.circleci.com/pipelines/github/ethereum-optimism/optimism/98223/workflows/f4c25eef-d1df-45f8-bb36-c273ce969ca9/jobs/3777991/steps) reports multiple failed tests yet logs are:

- Missing for any `TestL2EngineAPI*` tests
- Empty for e.g. `TestL1MinerBuildBlock`

Fixes https://github.com/ethereum-optimism/optimism/issues/17151

topPRs.title: cannon: Deploy Cannon with Go 1.24 support
topPRs.author: mbaxter
topPRs.body:
<!--
Contributions welcome! See https://github.com/ethereum-optimism/.github/blob/master/CONTRIBUTING.md
-->

**Description**

Support the deployment of [Cannon version 8](https://github.com/ethereum-optimism/optimism/blob/0b96267f0679de5fb949d1eee04ec7cd081ee561/cannon/mipsevm/versions/version.go#L28-L29) with Go 1.24 support. 

**Tests**

Existing tests were updated to validate the correct version of Cannon is deployed.

**Metadata**

Fixes https://github.com/ethereum-optimism/optimism/issues/17095

topContributors.summary: janjakubnanista: Focused on investigating missing logs in acceptance tests, opening a PR (ethereum-optimism/optimism#17150) and creating a related issue (ethereum-optimism/optimism#17151) to address the problem.

hexshire: Focused on feature work, opening PR #749 "feat: add custom gas token" in ethereum-optimism/specs, and also engaged in bugfix and other work, modifying 35 files with 910 additions primarily in tests.
mbaxter: Focused on infrastructure updates, successfully deploying Cannon with Go 1.24 support via PR #17155 in ethereum-optimism/optimism, demonstrating a commitment to keeping core systems current.
tessr: Focused on user experience improvements for op-up, creating two issues (ethereum-optimism/optimism#17135, ethereum-optimism/optimism#17134) to enhance the shutdown and startup experience.

billcarsoon: Focused on minor documentation and code improvements, opening one PR in ethereum-optimism/op-analytics (#1726) to remove redundant words. Their work involved small changes across two files, balancing code and documentation updates.
AmadiMichael: Focused on significant code changes today, modifying 373 files with 3 commits (+12991/-6810 lines) primarily on bugfix work (67%) and tests work (33%), and also provided one review.
yashvardhan-kukreja: Focused on documentation improvements, creating an issue for a public docs review of Flashblocks (ethereum-optimism/optimism#17141).
sebastianst: Focused on bugfix work, making a single commit that modified one file (+8/-4 lines) and provided one PR comment.
